attributes.action: We do not need another referendum on EU membership
attributes.additional_details: Any analysis of election results will show a much lower turnout than the 23 June 2016. See "Devon, A study in autonomy" , Ph.D, thesis,July 2005, that cites a norm of a 48 % turnout.
attributes.background: There is currently a petition calling for another vote on the basis that there should be a 78% turnout at the referendum. As the 72 % turnout was exceptionally high on Thursday 23 June, this is unjustified and calls into question all election results with a low number of voters.
